name: NSTextSelection.Granularity
desc: Values that describe the different granularities available to make a selection.

items.name: case character
items.desc: A value that represents selection by character.

items.name: case word
items.desc: A value that represents selection by word.

items.name: case paragraph
items.desc: A value that represents selection by paragraph.

items.name: case line
items.desc: A value that represents selection by line.

items.name: case sentence
items.desc: A value that represents selection by sentence.
